channel.title: Is there a way to sit in the chair in the recent clients?
channel.description:
is there a way to sit in a chair in the recent clients (silab soft client). if so pls tell me.
ty
edit: anyone??

item.title: Is there a way to sit in the chair in the recent clients?
item.dc:creator: @elweb elweb
item.description:
@elweb wrote:

I don’t think there is right now.
I way i think you could do it is if you go into client.java nd search for item on object, make it so when you use a random item on a chair, make it so you teleport to the exact coords of the chair and change your emote to a sitting down emote and you’d be sitting in a chair.

The other way i can think of is make a command where it changes your emote to a sitting down emote and creates a chair underneath you,

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“sit”)&& playerRights >= 2){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“sit”)){ //Voule Command Generator
pEmote = 0346;
sendMessage(“have a sit”);

}
[/code]
im not sure how to make it add an object in a command but that will make you sit

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a way to sit in the chair in the recent clients?
